attributes.action: Recognise in Law that Men create the wealth and that come divorce, women are only entitled to a third of the wealth and then only if babies are given, else only that what they bring.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Despite law of equality, most money is man made, and most men employ women as breeders
They should get a living wage, not a steal from your wage.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
